testSteps.description: Then Brand filter should be an element that is visible
Ricardo clicks on the Brand filter
Then The total search results  should be a string containing 'Shoes'
Then The number of filters should be (1)
Then The Filter [filterName=Brand, filterKey=Puma] should be applied
